/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, is flanked by towering buildings and lush green trees, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, adding to the vibrancy of the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the cityscape. The image is bathed in natural daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
